Curse of Blinding Radiance.name: Curse of Blinding Radiance
Curse of Blinding Radiance.flavor: White light blazes from you, stealing your foe’s vision and giving you new power with which you bring this contest to a close.
Curse of Blinding Radiance.onHit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Curse of Blinding Radiance.effect: Until the end of your next turn, your attacks against the target deal 5 extra radiant damage.

White Well Invocation.name: White Well Invocation
White Well Invocation.flavor: The White Well’s magic transforms you into pure moonlight, enabling you to move with supernatural speed. The grief carried by the magic, though, can overwhelm you.
White Well Invocation.effect: You activate an aura 1 that lasts until the end of the encounter. The aura is filled with bright light. Whenever you take damage while the aura is active, roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, you can teleport up to 5 squares after taking the damage and become insubstantial until the start of your next turn. On a 1or 2, you are dazed until the start of your next turn. Otherwise, nothing happens.

White Well Transformation.name: White Well Transformation
White Well Transformation.flavor: The White Well’s magic flows through you, transforming you into a radiant champion. Your foes recoil in fear from your brilliant aspect.
White Well Transformation.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to Reflex, Will, and speed, and you can use the secondary power once per round.
White Well Transformation.requirement: The power White Well Transformation must be active in order to use this power.
White Well Transformation.onHit: 10 radiant damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
